page.title: 08WROXALL VILLAGERS: 2 LADIES
page.content: {MRS WILFORD}gets up at 6am,comes down,makes coffee and prepares a{meal Her husband goes to work at 7.10.She then{tidies up}- a job she does often through the day. At 7.30 she wakes her daughter,who has breakfast,gets ready and catches the school mini-bus. Mrs. Wilford has a drink,then goes to{work 9am-2.30pm. She comes home to do {washing and ironing.}Then she prepares the{tea.}On Thursdays she gets ready for being{an assistant Guide helper. At 9.00 she comes home, has{supper}and goes to{bed}around 10pm. {MRS.APPLEBY}gets up at 6.30am to take her eldest daughter to work.She gets the family{breakfast}at 7.30, dresses the youngest child, and gets herself organised.She{works}10am-4pm, picking up her eldest girl at 1.30.She does {housework}in the evening,and goes to {bed}about midnight.
